name: draftkings Chef cookbook
readme:
# draftkings cookbook

[![Build Status](http://drone.dkinternal.com/api/badges/draftkingsdevelopers/draftkings-cookbook/status.svg)](http://drone.dkinternal.com/draftkingsdevelopers/draftkings-cookbook)

This cookbook installs all the files and configs for a draftkings host


## Requirements

to test this cookbook, you will need to install the following vagrant plugins:

* [vagrant-s3auth][6]

You will need to set AWS_PROFILE=default
assuming default is what you defined the DK dev aws account as

### platforms

* Windows Server 2012 R2
* Windows Server 2012 R2 Core

#### cookbooks

* [iis][0]
* [windows][1]
* [chocolatey][2]
* [nuget][3]
* [windows_firewall][4]
* [octopus-deploy][5]
